articles.title: The 'four lads in jeans' have been honoured with a statue in the Birmingham spot the pic was taken - Daily Mail
articles.description: The four lads in jeans unveiled a statue in Birmingham where they became famous. Sculptor William Douglas made the artwork from women mannequins, paper-mâché and bronze paint.
articles.content:
The 'four lads in jeans' who rose to internet fame when their photo was turned into a meme have been honoured with a statue in the spot the now famous photo was taken.
